Keyboard shortcuts for 1Password

A visual cheat-sheet for the 28 keyboard shortcuts found in 1Password

Original Reference Report Issue

Global Shortcuts

Fill login on current web page

  • Ctrl
  • \

Show 1Password mini

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • \

Open 1Password

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • \

Lock 1Password

  • Win/Opt
  • Shift
  • L

1Password App

Create a new item

  • Ctrl
  • N

Create a new item in the selected category

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • N

Edit the selected item

  • Ctrl
  • E

Cancel an edit or clear the search field

  • Esc

Save changes to an item

  • Ctrl
  • S

Move the selected item(s) to the trash

  • Ctrl
  • Del

Move, delete, or change the type of the selected field

  • Shift
  • Enter

Show vaults

  • Ctrl
  • D

Find items

  • Ctrl
  • F

Search all items

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • F

Open selected login item (when unlocked), or unlock using secure desktop (when locked)

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Reveal the selected password

  • Ctrl
  • R

Reveal all passwords in the item details

  • Ctrl
  • Alt

View the selected password in large type

  • Ctrl
  • L

Copy the selected item to the clipboard

  • Ctrl
  • C

Copy the username, password, or one-time password of the selected item

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • C

Select the previous item detail

  • Ctrl
  • Up

Select the next item detail

  • Ctrl
  • Down

Move the item detail up

  • Alt
  • Up

Move the item detail down

  • Alt
  • Down

Decrease the font size

  • Ctrl
  • -

Increase the font size

  • Ctrl
  • +

Reset the font size

  • Ctrl
  • 0

Sign in to a 1Password account

  • Ctrl
  • O
